author: Lonewolf5529
title: Chariots of Fire
review:
So now that I have that soung stuck in your head...

This was actually the first set I bought on returning to LEGO after 15-20 years.  Mostly because I thought the flames coming out the back of the chariot were pretty awesome.

As far as the set, we have Azari, our fire elf, speeding along on her mission (which, looking at later sets, is apparently the resuce of Sophie).  The goblin antagonist tries to stop her with some nasty carnivorous plants, but no worries, Azari has a crossbow that shoots fire discs!

As a former KFOL returning now as an AFOL, I'm impressed by all the moving parts (chomping plants, working crossbow!, and flames that move in and out).  I also like these new, more lifelike minifigs.  The diversity of skintones on them is also a plus.  I'm given to understand they are only in the Friends and Elves sets, which is a shame.  I'd like to see more of them.

Overall, a really great set.  It was enough to get me back into LEGO and hooked on the Elves line, so, yea.
